metadata.name: Horse A
metadata.description: I made this drawing for a large collection of different horses. The painting is very delicate and carefully drawn with fine and delicate lines with watercolor on cardboard and its dimensions are 50 x 70 cm.I painted it in such a way that it is hyper real, but it is clear that it is a painting  .   Also, the painting is not a copy, it is completely original, and I painted it from the photo of the horse
